lead_paragraph: Jerome Liebling and Fred W. McDarrah were contemporaries who photographed the city in different styles but who will be paired in exhibitions at the Steven Kasher Gallery in Chelsea.

headline.print_headline: On the Streets and in the Studios
headline.main: Two Visual Tales of New York

snippet: Jerome Liebling and Fred W. McDarrah were contemporaries who photographed the city in different styles but who will be paired in exhibitions at the Steven Kasher Gallery in Chelsea.
abstract: Works of late New York photographers Jerome Liebling and Fred W McDarrah, contemporaries whose styles in documenting New York City streets differed greatly, will be paired in two exhibitions at Steven Kasher Gallery in Chelsea.
